entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Access Violation through reflection not caught as NRE on .NET 6 #61486
  • [Mono] TE plaintext and json benchmarks regression #61484
  • superpmi-asmdiffs pipeline improvements #61483
    7.0.0
  • Error generating win-x86 SuperPMI asm diffs for libraries.crossgen2 collection #61482
    7.0.0
  • Performance Improvement - Ternary operator with constants #61480
  • System.Random.XoshiroImpl seeding inconsistency between platforms #61478
  • SocketsHttpHandler: Support zero-byte read on response streams #61475
  • There should be a centralized way for the Build Monitor to disable any test #61473
  • ReadyToRun images crash if compiled for AVX2 but run on non-AVX2 CPU #61471
    7.0.0
  • Some repos do not contribute to third-party-notices file #61466
  • Class Ping not reading response when ICMP Time-to-live exceeded #61465
  • Console.WriteLine no longer outputs to the screen on Ubuntu 20.04 after upgrading to .NET version 6.0 #61468
  • [wasm][debugger] Not able to evaluate a static member in a nested class #61462
    7.0.0
  • Buffer allocated on LOH by XmlTextReader when using Async mode #61459
  • Single file executable extraction path not writable when setuid bit is used #61458
  • API Proposal: ValueStack<T> and other stack-allocated collection types #61456
    Future
  • JIT - Folding unwanted foreach with empty list. #61455
    Future
  • Intermittent build failures caused by missing PlatformManifest.txt #61451
  • Use instance methods for SerializeHandler in source gen #61448

Closed

  • Activity.SetParentId does not change RootId and Id #60078
    7.0.0
  • CompositionContainer is not thread safe - even when constructed as thread safe #59505
    7.0.0
  • Could not load file or assembly 'System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource, Version=5.0.0.1, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=cc7b13ffcd2ddd51' or one of its dependencies. The located assembly's manifest definition does not match the assembly reference. #61445
  • Add generate crash report flag (and other flags) to WriteDump diagnostics IPC message #60775
    6.0.x
  • createdump crash report can have multiple threads indicated as crashed #60932
    6.0.x
  • Creating ImmutableDictionary from an existing dictionary is very slow #29089
    Future
  • [.NET 6] [Production Bug] System.Text.Json.JsonSerializer.Serialize(Tuple.Create()) inconsistency between (debug/release) & published #61406
  • [Uri] A lightweight alternative for System.Uri #34873
    7.0.0
  • Test failure Loader/classloader/DictionaryExpansion/DictionaryExpansion/DictionaryExpansion.sh #61299
  • dictionaryexpansion tests failing on Mono #61322
  • [API Proposal]: Posix error codes #61351

PullRequests

Created

  • Implement PEM exports for RSA PKCS#1 and ECPrivateKey #61487
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Don't run the JIT formatting job in CI #61485
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add AppStart task to the bench Sample #61481
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Remove explicit '.exe' extension from assembly names in ilproj tests #61479
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Remove all DLLIMPORTGENERATOR_ENABLED usage. #61476
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Update TargetHasAVXSupport to correctly check for AVX support by accounting for all ISAs and bits necessary #61474
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update .NET SDK to the .NET 6.0 RTM SDK #61472
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm][debugger] Improvement of memory consumption while Evaluating Expressions #61470
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [Mono] Fix support for nested structs with explicit layout #61467
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Allow runtimeconfig StartupHooks and Environment StartupHooks to both be present #61461
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Handle empty string parameter value in MetadataLoadContext #61457
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • [mono] Add a 'inline_method' profiler event. #61454
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Update how OSR and PGO interact #61453
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [IGNORE] debugging wasm/windows tests #61450
  • Update Proxy-Support check to be case insensitive #61446
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Create runtime staging clone to manually kick off full test runs #61443
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Merged

  • Add tests for metricseventsource HistogramLimitReached(#60752, #61199) #61449
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • release/6.0.1: Preserve last error in call-counting stubs #60887
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 6.0.1
  • Updating src/tests/Interop/PInvoke/Generics/GenericsNative.Vector* to annotate individual methods as requiring AVX #61259
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • PKCS#8 and SPKI PEM Exports #61439
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Allow nfloat to be in the ObjCRuntime namespace, and make it work for Xamarin.MacCatalyst.dll as well. #60861
    Servicing-approved, area-Interop-mono, os-maccatalyst, 6.0.x
  • Update the ref pack version to 6.0.0 for apicompat #61429
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Enable sourcelink in source-build to produce `.version` file in shared fx #60944
  • Refine superpmi-replay trigger #61469
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] The 6.0 branch is no longer pre-release #61442
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/5.0] Fix incorrect CCW decoding in GetObjectForCCW #61342
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 5.0.13
  • Use DllImportGenerator in System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter #61389
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Remove pre-release version iteration #61438
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix bug where we reference the entry #0 in the pinned plug queue #60966
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [Mono] Skip flaky android tests #61460
    area-System.Net, os-android
  • Include the "TargetingPack" folder in the mobile apps. #61432
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Some more precise debug info improvements #61419
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Clean up tests under Interop/PInvoke/BestFitMapping #61390
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix CI trigger of superpmi-asmdiffs pipeline #61444
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: slightly more aggressive tail duplication #61179
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix Array ctor integer widening and add Reflection tests #61347
    area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
  • Explicitly mark tests with CLRTestKind=SharedLibrary #61235
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Updated

  • [Wasm] JS modularization #61313
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1466094 #61274
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0][mono][interp] Fix GetType called on ptr constrained to Nullable` (#6… #61305
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 6.0.x
  • Make intrinsic nodes multi op (aka delete `GT_LIST`) #59912
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • XARCH: Remove redudant tests for GT_LT/GT_GE relops. #61152
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Set some missing `GTF_GLOB_REF` and improve its checking. #61245
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Disable partial generic sharing for gparams with non-enum constraints. #59437
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/6.0] 1388 xml serializer assembly load context awareness #61266
    Servicing-consider, area-Serialization, 6.0.x
  • Implement Narrow and Widen using SIMDAsHWIntrinsic #60094
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Adding support for X86Base.Pause() and ArmBase.Yield() #61065
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Hide 'align' instruction behind jmp #60787
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] [wasm] Allow enums in unmanaged callbacks. #61393
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 6.0.x
  • Provide locations for src-gen diagnostic output #61430
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Rework memory stream management #61392
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/6.0.1] Support async operations on unseekable files #61410
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO, 6.0.1
  • Add JsonSerializerOptions.Default #61434
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Remove SupportedOSPlatformAttribute("windows") from LdapSessionOption #61388
    area-System.DirectoryServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Prototype mark overflow fix for regions #60646
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Added AsReadOnly extension methods for IDictionary<T, U> and IList<T> #61172
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Infra for regeneration of third-party-notices file #60091
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Optimize System.Diagnostics.TraceSource #60464
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, needs more info, community-contribution
  • Change OperIsBlkOp test to check for store block operators #60878
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Rewrite selection for fields and always normalize SIMD types in VN #61370
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [TEST ONLY] Test stress build refactor #61311
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW
  • System.IO files cleanup #61413
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix evaluation of a static class attribute; using current namespace for evaluation #61252
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Wasm marshaler API for user-defined types; migrate Uri and DateTime to new API #47640
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono
  • Optimize FMA codegen base on the overwritten #58196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Run AOT, and Wasm.Build.Tests on windows #59479
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, Future
  • [SUPER DRAFT] New API for invoking JS functions from C# #60765
    arch-wasm
  • Use SIMD operations in InitBlkUnroll/CopyBlkUnroll and increase unroll limit up to 128 bytes #61030
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Completely lock-free ClassLoader::LookupTypeKey #61346
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix perf issues discovered in "For software performance, can you always trust inlining" blog #61408
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Apply BuiltInComInterop feature switch to managed code #54056
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • SPMI no ASMDiff between Checked and Release #61335
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Binder` #57418
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, 7.0.0
  • Update previous netcoreapp version to run API Compat against 6.0 ref pack #61437
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • POC src/tests tree test xunit-based source generated runner #60846
    area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-11
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Can I use Native AOT to compile WPF now? #1717

Updated

  • Implement ICustomMarshaler #160

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Create new IR Node to represent LLVM args #1716

Merged

  • Disable fat calls in delegate invoke methods #1715
    area-NativeAOT
  • Speed up IsInstanceOfClass #1714
    area-NativeAOT

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Support for more unary and binary ops #1705

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Automatically import usings for References #22552
  • Uninstall .NET 6 SDK preview versions in Windows #22551
  • Icon.Save(stream) each time returns different results #22549
  • Improvising The HotReload Feature #22547
  • .NET SDK 5.0.402 to .NET SDK 5.0.403 compilation failure with CA1416: Validate platform compatibility #22546
  • dotnet run option '--no-dependencies' is passed on as argument to application #22545
  • `dotnet run` of a newly created ASP.NET Core project on MacOS prompts for password to allow keychain access #22544
    6.0.1xx

Closed

  • [Breaking change] For `dotnet test`, switch `-r` to alias `--runtime` instead of `--results-dir` #21952
  • [Breaking change] For `dotnet test`, switch `-a` to alias `--arch` instead of `--test-adapter-path` #21389

PullRequests

Created

  • Tell user when workload has already been installed #22557
    Area-Workloads

Merged

  • Remove -r parameter for dotnet test, and change -a parameter to be shorthand for --arch, instead of --test-adapter-path #22497
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Treat SDK previews as separate workload feature bands #22446
    Area-Workloads
  • Remove reference to PlatformAbstractions #22254
    Servicing-approved
  • Ensure references added using "Reference" are correctly copied in BlazorWASM projects #22542
    Area-AspNetCore

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Flaky Test] Roslyn.VisualStudio.IntegrationTests.CSharp.CSharpCodeActions.GenerateMethodInClosedFile times out #57722
  • [Flaky Test] Roslyn.VisualStudio.IntegrationTests.VisualBasic.BasicNavigationBar.CodeSpit #57719
  • Update the inline rename UI #57715
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis v4.0.1 Causes Dependency Issues #57708
  • EditorConfig Code style with all_upper does not allow names starting with M_, S_ or T_ #57706
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Project has no documentation on how the Documents are populated. #57709
  • [Flaky Test] Roslyn.VisualStudio.IntegrationTests.CSharp.CSharpInteractiveDirectives.WorkspaceClearedAfterReset #57701
  • Config for IDE0002 to ignore `base` #57700
  • Allow non-fatal error reports to include FaultSeverity #57699

Closed

  • stacktrace explorer #41557
    17.1.P2
  • Type vs Name resolution breaks when type is a nullable value type #57710
  • Cascadia Code/Mono crashes VS 2022 Editor #57704
  • Implicit namespace based on folder structure #57705
  • 'CS1591' should not suggest Design.cs file. #57595

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix featureflag name for .net 6 host in UI #57723
    Area-IDE
  • Transform the GeneratorDriver even if the Compilation was GCed #57721
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #57718
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #57717
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #57716
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Ignore function types in return type inference #57713
    Area-Compilers
  • Inline Hints: VB fix parameter to match colon equal syntax #57712
    Area-IDE
  • Update stream jsonrpc version to enable workspace diagnostics #57703
    Area-IDE
  • [17.0] Fix line delta calculation for top-level code (#57556) #57694
    Area-Interactive, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • Simplify implementation of SourceGeneratedFileItemSource #57691
    Area-IDE
  • Upgrade Microsoft.VisualStudio.Validation to 17.0.34 #57689
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Don't capture dumps for out-of-sync generator drivers #57714
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #57720
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Modify timeout to avoid flaky integration tests #57711
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #57661
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix race condition in computing _hostAnalyzerStateMap #57648
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge, 17.0.1
  • Mitigate the GeneratorDriver missync issue while capturing dumps #57680
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge, 17.0.1
  • Merge `main` branch into `list-patterns` #57690
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #57619
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Updated

  • Enable dumps for hung tests #57549
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Port BasicAddMissingReference.InvokeSomeFixesInVisualBasicThenVerifyReferences to the new test framework #57626
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57635
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • API for getting a deterministic key for a Compilation #57134
    Area-Compilers
  • Add basic implementation of new rename UI #57686
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Use helpers in param-nullchecking emit #57615
    Area-Compilers
  • Check constraints on lifted operator types #57050
    Area-Compilers
  • Document why we have -vs-deps branches #41153
    Area-Infrastructure, Documentation
  • Handling defaults provided by IAsyncCompletionDefaultsSource #57685
    Area-IDE
  • Incremental Generator Work Tracking API Implementation #55469
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.1
  • List patterns: Slice value is assumed to be never null #57457
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Remove the hang mitigating timeout from BuildWithCommandLine #57684
    Area-IDE
  • Move Default VB Version to 16.9 #57688
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix #55183: Add SymbolVisitor<TArgument, TResult> #56530
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.1
  • Handle Array/Collection initializers case for implicit object creation analyzer #57679
    Area-IDE, Community
  • [SourceLink] Use correct encoding for embedded text #57683
    Area-IDE
  • Address some PROTOTYPE markers #57318
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Don't analyze local function bodies as though they are top level code #57623
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Make RateLimiters disposable #38308
  • Blazor can't use EventCallback with array TypeParam value #38307
  • Redesign the current aspnetcore Concurrency limiter middleware to use the new abstractions & implementations #38306
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor.defaultReconnectionHandler._reconnectCallback undefined #38305
  • Startup regression: json #38304
  • ASP.NET Core SignalR - SkipNegotiation by default and use Negotiation if WebSocket connection fails. #38300
  • Input elements not generating scope identifier from CSS isolation #38299
  • error trying to run dotnet watch #38303
  • IIS dont Run my App in Asp.NetCore 2.2 Helpme Please #38298
  • Access token exhaustion when using client credentials flow #38297
    Discussions
  • StaticFileMiddleware serve pre-compressed file when found by file provider #38295
  • Blazor: File referenced in nuget .props file but the file itself is not in the nuget package #38294
  • Conflicting assets with the same target path after upgrading Blazor from .net 5 to .net 6 #38292
  • InputBase does not update FieldIdentifier when a new ValueExpression is set #38288
  • @microsoft/signalr V6.0.0 is not working on react-native apps #38286
  • Startup improvement: fortunes #38285
  • BUG: Reopen #38192 #38282
  • Moving BlazorDesktop WinForm by dragging element in BlazorWebView crashes #38277
  • Why is aspnetcore looking for deps.json in production env? #38275

Closed

  • Publish Blazor WebAssembly from Visual Studio with Web Deploy to Azure AppService results in lots of errors: Failed to find a valid digest in the 'integrity' attribute for resource #38289
  • Perf regression: mvc #38284
  • Perf improvement: endpoint #38283
  • `dotnet watch` (hot reload) does not set property `DotNetWatchBuild` or `DOTNET_WATCH` #38296
  • Blazor WASM hosted on IIS 10 log in exception for some users. #23215
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor Hot Reload only Works with dotnet watch, not from Visual Studio 2022 #38202
  • ModelState cannot be added to TempData (cannot be serialized) #4816
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Inconsistent HTML Encoding of Validation Message #4830
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Textarea tagHelper is not rendering the contents of the element correctly. #4852
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Stop setting name attribute in DefaultHtmlGenerator.GenerateHiddenForCheckbox #4942
    .NET 7 Planning
  • TempData entry is not deleted when redirecting #26798
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor WASM : .NET 5 RC2 : Looking for non referenced native DLLs. Resource has been Blocked #27097
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Remove third-party dependencies from templates #27337
    .NET 7 Planning
  • setting LowercaseQueryStrings = false not working as expected. #32533
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor WASM site flagged as malicious by Google Ads #37388
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Is there a way to access `window` object in the Browser from Blazor Webassembly? #37790
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor wasm auth diagnostics #38123
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor server connection reliability improvements #38124
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Template/MVC tests fail after updating TFM to net7.0 #36765
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Code used in .NetConf Day 1 #38253
  • Add support for CSS isolation in MVC tag helpers #38265
  • .NET inside browsers #38278
  • ASP.Net 6 custom WebApplicationFactory throws exception #38248
  • Build From Source inconsistencies #38181
  • The group can be removed if there is none in the group in signalr? #38200

PullRequests

Created

  • Resolve Component Governance bugs #38310
  • Enable trimming for some libraries #38302
  • [SPA] Fix whitespace issues with the SpaProxy bash script #38293
    area-runtime, 6.0.x

Merged

  • [main] Mark 6.0 API surface as shipped #38281
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • [main] Update to latest #38280
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Avoid null ref in TagHelperMatchingConvention when attribute name is null #38271
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, 6.0.1
  • Enable TrackLinkedCacheEntries for cache tag helpers #38190
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Update to latest #38231
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.1
  • [release/6.0] Let VS update our solution #38279
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.1
  • Fix Visual Studio 2019 components configuration file #38182
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Fix EmptyBodyBehavior with empty content-type #38092
    area-mvc, feature-Model-Binding
  • Add attributes to SignalR source generator #38025
    area-signalr, api-suggestion
  • Support binding to form and form file parameters in minimal actions #35158
    api-suggestion, community-contribution, feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks
  • TESTING AUTOMATION. THIS WON'T BE MERGE #38272
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Enhancement] ProgressBar should implement System.IProgress<float> #3360
  • [Bug] KnownColor.SetAccent is currently not initialized on any platforms #3359
  • [Enhancement] Device and Page Orientation #3358
  • Unable to find IAnimationManager for 'Microsoft.Maui.Controls #3353

Closed

  • [Enhancement] YOUR IDEA! #3357
  • [Community Toolkit Feature Promotion] Expand WeakEventManager to Support `Delegate` #2703
  • [Bug] Publishing maui rc2 app to App Store not working -- The app references non-public symbols in MyContactNetwork.MobileMaui: _proc_pidinfo #3290

PullRequests

Created

  • [Proposal] Obsolete AndExpand #3362
    proposal/open
  • Fix Scoping of MauiContext as it relates to Modal Pages #3361
  • Introduce IVisualDiagnosticsLayer #3351
    partner/ui-tools

Merged

  • Remove ConfigureAwait when there's no await #3352
  • [workload] setup C# implicit global usings from MSBuild #3267
    area/setup 🪄, area/templates 📄
  • Expand WeakEventManager to Support Delegate #3253
  • Fix CodeDom reference #3339
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #3350
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • [Android] Update SecureStorage to use EncryptedSharedPreferences #2807
    area/essentials 🍞, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • Move `IDispatcher` logic out of `IPlatformServices` #2862
    area/controls 🎮, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • Update issue templates to use GitHub forms (beta) #3320
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Validate and Fix MAUI Navigation Pages against our legacy tests #3329
  • Add CarouselView handlers on Controls #3141
  • Implement RefreshViewHandler on Windows #3299
    area/controls 🎮
  • Implement GoBack, GoForward and Reload methods in WebViewHandler #3316
    area/controls 🎮
  • Allow to use string to define StrokeShape in XAML #3256
    area/Xaml </>, area/drawing ✏️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How to access dynamic DbSets that were created by the builder #26636
  • EF.Functions.Like should be annotated to accept nullable string? #26634
  • Variable names must be unique within a query batch or stored procedure #26632
  • IDbContextFactory async contract vs covariance #26630
  • Stack overflow when using circular composite key dependencies #26629
  • [6.0][CosmosDB] System.ArgumentException: value must not be null, empty, or whitespace. #26627
  • Use EF6 as an oracle for procedural testing of EF Core queries #26626
    7.0.0
  • [CosmosDB] An entity that contains owned children cannot be updated properly #26625
  • EF Core 6.0 System.ArgumentNullException: Value cannot be null. (Parameter 'provider') #26624

Closed

  • Cosmos dbcontext retrieves empty results #26628
  • Subquery.Contains throws when the type of item is value type #26593
    6.0.1
  • Lazy loading not working with toListAsync #26633
  • .NET6 exception on Linq queries with EntityFramework 5 #26635
  • Using `GroupBy` with auto-generated expression passed to `Select` throws an exception in RC1 and RC2 #26525
  • Query: Owned entity without owner logic #24807
  • OwnsMany cannot use HasQueryFilter #14113
  • dotnet-ef scaffolding issue starting .NET 6 #26631
  • Outer join generated instead of inner join? #16528
  • Scaffolding Migrations programmatically in Asp.Net Core 5 and EF Core 5 #23595
  • Query: add translation for string.IndexOf(string, int) #25396
    7.0.0
  • dbscaffold creates reference error CS0120 in nameof() for InverseProperty in certain conditions #26588
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Query: More VB CompareString normalization #26642
    auto-merge
  • Query: Defer inline-ing owned navigation expansion till all joins are… #26641
    auto-merge
  • [6.0.1] Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Handle more nulls in ApplicationDataHelper #26637

Merged

  • Use latest SDK & runtime #26640
    auto-merge
  • Remove quirks #26639
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #26638
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [6.0.1] Query: Optimize Contains to Any recursively #26599
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.x
  • Switch to 1ES servicing pools on release/2.1 #26149
    area-infrastructure
  • Query: SqlServer: Add translation for string.IndexOf(string, int) #26623
    auto-merge, community-contribution
  • RevEng: Don't use nameof syntax #26622
    auto-merge
  • Move to OSX 11.0 for helix queues #26616
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • Fix to #26451 - Temporal Table: Owned Entities support #26526
  • Query: Throw error for unhandled derived query root expression #26579
  • Evolve null-checking approach in SQLite provider #26535
  • Fix double negation in SQL generation #26313

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Product Versions are out of date for source-build #12641

Closed

  • dotnet --list-sdks did not work #12627

PullRequests

Created

  • Update the product version in source-build for 6.0.0 #12643
  • Fix previously-source-built bootstrap #12642
  • Merge 6.0.1xx to 6.0.2xx #12640

Merged

  • Bundle workload manifests as separate MSIs #12600
    Servicing-approved
  • Update to 6.0 in our wxl files as that was reverted a while back. #12550
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/6.0.1xx] dotnet/runtime: Enable source-link in source-build for '.version' file #12527
  • Specify depth when updating submodules #12588
  • Flow environment variables into run-build #12637
  • [release/5.0.4xx] update Asp.Net templates #12596
  • [release/5.0.2xx] update Asp.Net templates #12595

Updated

  • Remove 2.1 templates from dynamic templates #12511
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Add some additional distros to the CI matrix #12141
  • Only add intermediates to previous source-built archive #12574
  • Port #12374 to release/6.0.2xx #12635
  • Port #12374 to release/6.0.1xx #12636
  • Also publish non-portable RID runtime symbols tarball #12622
